Red Faction: Armageddon Original Soundtrack featuring the original music score from the highly anticipated sci-fi action video game developed by Volition Inc., an internal studio at THQ Inc. The soundtrack album was written, arranged and sequenced by composer and music producer Brian Reitzell as a truly immersive listening experience.
